title: (x) Rainier Beer script - similar to Goldsmith Script {Dav}
content:
Howdy,

I'm trying to track down the closest thing to the Rainier Beer font. I realize it was probably custom drawn, but is there anything commercially available that is close?

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [rainierbottle1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313141907/http:/typophile.com/files/rainierbottle1.jpg) | 19.07 KB |
author: dee gee

comments.content:
' [Goldsmith _Script_](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313141907/http:/letterheadfonts.com/contributors/johnstudden/goldsmith.shtml)', _by [John Studden](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313141907/http:/typophile.com/wiki/John%20Studden)_, _and_, ' [Byron](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313141907/http:/www.roostertypes.com/prod_display.asp?group_id=Byron)', _by A Pat Hickson_, _may be alternates_.. _( And, You may possibly like ' [Radio](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313141907/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Radio/mudTyper+Weights/)', by [Magnus Rakeng](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313141907/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Magnus%20Rakeng).. :)_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313141907/http:/www.formlos.net/)
Thanks Dav, Goldsmith Script should work just fine. Regards from Seattle!

"I realize it was probably custom drawn"

I guess by Walter Landor. Now, object9 — doing great work with Rainier.
